name: Parking Masters
description:
You love your car, and you love precision parking even a bit more. Park as near as you can to the blue car, and prove yourself to be a true Parking Master (tm)

Instructions

  • Press up for the gas pedal
  • Press x for the clutch pedal
  • Press c for the break pedal
  • Press left and right to shift gear

Featuring

  • Photorealistic graphics!
  • 60FPS!
  • Hot parking action!
  • A crude understanding of the relationship between RPM and acceleration!
  • Cars!
